summary: Order 024 Daylands safety pipeline pilot completed successfully. Docs-only change executed with sandbox validation and canary simulation. Charter updated, monitoring/rollback runbooks documented.

change_proposal.intent: Pilot Daylands safety pipeline framework on docs-only change
change_proposal.risks: Minimal - documentation change only, no code execution
change_proposal.rollback: git revert if charter content needs revision

sandbox_validation.details: Templates and lanes configuration validated. Schema checks green. No production paths modified.
validation_steps: Confirmed no code execution paths modified

canary_rollout.details: Simulated canary lane using existing telemetry infrastructure. Monitoring runbooks documented. Rollback procedures defined.

runbooks_documented.monitoring: Key metrics defined with targets for canary/production observation
runbooks_documented.rollback: Triggers and procedure documented with example PowerShell commands

next_steps: Daylands safety pipeline framework operational. Ready for Order 028 (canary Alfa batches) which will execute first real canary rollout with enhanced telemetry.
